about.description: A comprehensive collection of common expressions in Zambian languages
about.purpose: To help users communicate effectively in everyday situations across Zambia

languages.bemba: A major language spoken in the Northern, Luapula, and Copperbelt provinces
languages.tonga: Widely spoken in the Southern Province
languages.nyanja: Common in the Eastern Province and Lusaka

categories_info.family: Terms for family members and relationships

usage_notes.formality: Many phrases have formal and informal versions
usage_notes.regional_variations: Some expressions may vary by region
usage_notes.context: Consider cultural context when using phrases

phrases.english: Where can I find a taxi?
phrases.lozi: Ni kona ku fumana tekisi kai?
Ni kupa ku ni isa kwa...

phrases.english: Is this the right way to...?
phrases.bemba: Bushe iyi e nshila iya ku...?
phrases.tonga: Sena eyi nje nzila iinka ku...?
phrases.nyanja: Kodi iyi ndi njira yoyenera ku...?
phrases.lozi: Kana ki yona nzila ye ya kwa...?
phrases.kaonde: Bushe ino yo jishinda ja ku...?
phrases.tumbuka: Kasi iyi ndi nthowa yakuya ku...?
phrases.nsenga: Kodi iyi ndi njira yoyenera ku...?

phrases.lozi: Mwa kona ku ni tusa ku fumana...?

phrases.bemba: Bushe kuli icifulwa ca kulila mupepi?
phrases.lozi: Kana ku na ndu ya lico fa kaufi?

phrases.english: How long does it take to get there?
phrases.bemba: Cisenda inshita itali shani ukufika kulya?
phrases.tonga: Citola ciindi cilamfu buti kusika okuya?
phrases.nyanja: Zimatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji kufika kumeneko?
phrases.lozi: Ki nako ye kuma kai ku fita kwani?
phrases.kaonde: Kisenda kimye kyabaya byepi kufika konka?
phrases.tumbuka: Chikutora nyengo yitali uli kufika kula?
phrases.nsenga: Zimatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji kufika kumeneko?

phrases.english: Can you write down the address?
phrases.lozi: Mwa kona ku ni ñolela keyala?
Ni kona ku cinca mali kai?
Ki sika mañi mu ni eleza?

phrases.nyanja: Kodi chakudya cha mmawa chili mkati?
phrases.lozi: Kana lico la kakusasani li kulumelwa?
phrases.kaonde: Bushe kajo ka lukelo kaji mukachi?
phrases.nsenga: Kodi chakudya cha mmawa chili mkati?

phrases.english: Do you have any local dishes?
phrases.nyanja: Kodi muli ndi zakudya za kumudzi?
phrases.lozi: Kana muna ni lico za kwanu?
phrases.kaonde: Bushe muji na kajo ka kuno?
phrases.nsenga: Kodi muli ndi zakudya za kumudzi?

phrases.english: Where can I find a good restaurant?
phrases.bemba: Nikwi ningasanga icifulwa icisuma ica kulila?
phrases.lozi: Ni kona ku fumana ndu ya lico yende kai?
phrases.luvale: Ngunahase kuwana zuvo yakulila yamwaza kulihi?

phrases.english: How many siblings do you have?
We are having a family gathering
Send my regards to your family
Can you give me a discount?
Do you have this in a different size?
phrases.bemba: Bushe mwalikwata ici mu size imbi?
phrases.tonga: Sena muli aceeci mu size imbi?
phrases.nyanja: Kodi muli ndi izi mu size ina?
phrases.lozi: Kana una ye cwalo ka bukima bo buñwi?
phrases.kaonde: Bushe muji na kino mu size mukwabo?
phrases.tumbuka: Kasi muli na ichi mu size yinyake?
phrases.nsenga: Kodi muli ndi izi mu size ina?

phrases.english: Do you have this in a different color?
phrases.bemba: Bushe mwalikwata ici mu color imbi?
phrases.tonga: Sena muli aceeci mu bbala limbi?
phrases.nyanja: Kodi muli ndi izi mu mtundu wina?
phrases.lozi: Kana una ye cwalo ka mubala o muñwi?
phrases.kaonde: Bushe muji na kino mu rangi mukwabo?
phrases.tumbuka: Kasi muli na ichi mu mtundu unyake?
phrases.nsenga: Kodi muli ndi izi mu mtundu wina?

phrases.english: I would like to buy this

phrases.lozi: Kana mwa amuhela ma credit cards?

phrases.english: Do you have any sales today?
phrases.lozi: Kana ku na ma sales kacenu?
Muzuzu wa ku likela u kai?

phrases.english: Please help me find my child
phrases.lozi: Ni kupa mu ni tuse ku fumana mwana ka

phrases.bemba: Pa kufumina pa bwangu pali kwi?
phrases.lozi: Munyako wa ku sabela u kai?
phrases.kaonde: Kibelo kya kutukila bukiji kiji kwepi?

phrases.nyanja: Zisanu n'ziwiri, Zisanu n'zitatu, Zisanu n'zinayi
phrases.kaonde: Bitanu bibiji, Bitanu bisatu, Bitanu bina
phrases.luvale: Vitanu navivali, Vitanu navitatu, Vitanu naviwana
phrases.tumbuka: Vikhondi na vibili, Vikhondi na vitatu, Vikhondi na vinayi
phrases.nsenga: Zisanu n'ziwiri, Zisanu n'zitatu, Zisanu n'zinayi

phrases.english: I need a pen and notebook

phrases.lozi: Sikolo i kalisa ka nako mañi?

phrases.english: Can I speak to the teacher?
phrases.lozi: Kana ni kona ku bulela ni muluti?
Nako ya ku pumula ki ifi?
Sikolo i fela ka nako mañi?
Ku kona ku ba ni mandinda
Kana ku na forecast ya lizazi?
Sipatela se si fakaufi si kai?
Kliniki i kwaluha ka nako mañi?
Li nako za ku potela ki lifi?
